name: Notion Weekly Planner
description: The easiest way to get organizedWeekly Planner is a Notion template that lets you plan and schedule all your events in an easy way. Thanks to its integration with Notion Calendar, you can retrieve all your items in your Notion Calendar app, allowing you to easily review and assign time slots. If you're feeling behind in life, if you struggle to keep track of all your tasks and events, this Notion template is the easiest way to get everything back on track.All you need, nothing you donâ€™t a space
features: a space to add your tasks, events, and appointments; drag and drop your items in your calendar view; an easy-to-use habit tracker (with a weekly view); a graph that displays all your habits progress; Notion Calendar integration; instructions
